name: src/calendar-round.js
CalendarRound
description: A combination of 260-day cycles and the Haab cycle.

params.name: tzolkin_day
params.description: Name of the name in the 260-day cycle

name: tzolkin
description: 260-day cycle component of the Calendar Round

name: haab
description: Haab cycle component of the Calendar Round

name: next
description: Increment both the Haab and 260-day cycle to the next day in the Calendar Round

name: src/factory.js
Factory
description: An abstract class to handle the create of an object from a string

name: constructor
description: Define properties to be override by sub-classes

name: pattern
description: Describes how to break a string into a date element

name: _split
description: Split the provided date into its components

name: _is_partial
description: Checks if the string contains a partial date

name: CalendarRoundFactory
description: A factory to create a CalendarRound object from a string
examples: let cr = new CalendarRoundFactory().parse("4 Ajaw 8 Kumk'u");

name: constructor
description: Defines the pattern describing a Calendar Round

name: pattern
description: Describes how to break the string into a Calendar Round

name: parse
description: Given a string, parse it and create a Calendar Round

params.name: raw
params.description: A string containing a Calendar Round

name: src/haab.js
Haab
description: Describes a Haab date with a position and a month
examples: let day = new Haab(8, new HaabMonth("Kumk'u"));

name: constructor
description: Constructor

params.name: coeff
params.description: The position in the Haab month for this date

name: next
description: Return the next day in the Haab cycle

name: name
description: Return a string representation of the Haab month name

name: HaabMonth
description: Describes only the month component of a Haab date

name: name
description: Name of the Haab month

name: next
description: Return the next month in the Haab cycle

name: src/tzolkin.js
Tzolkin
description: Describes a date in the 260-day cycle with a position and a day
examples: let day = new Tzolkin(4, new TzolkinDay("Ajaw"));

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: next
description: Return the next day in the 260-day cycle

name: name
description: Return a string representation of the 260-day cycle name

name: TzolkinDay
description: Describes only the day component of a 260-day cycle

name: name
description: Name of the day in the 260-day cycle

name: days
description: Mapping of day names to indexes

name: next
description: Return the next day in the 260-day cycle
